```{r}
library("datasets")
```

```{r}
work_with_dataset <- function(data, rows, columns, operation) {
  num_operation <- function(x, operation) {
    return(operation(x))
  }
  for(i in seq_along(columns)) {
    if (is.numeric(data[[columns[i]]])) {
      calculate_v[i] <- num_operation(data[rows,columns[i]], operation)
      
    } else {
      calculate_v <- table(data[rows,columns[i]])
    }
  }
  
  return(list(calculate_v))
}
```

```{r}
data = Orange
work_with_dataset(data, c(T,F), c('age'), mean)
```

```{r}
data = mtcars
work_with_dataset(data, c(1,2,3),c('mpg'),sd)
```
